channel.title: Looking for hoster OR help hosting
channel.description: Not sure where to put this topic, so I just put it here. I am looking for a hoster or someone to help me with hosting. I've worked on it for about 3 days now, got help from 2 people and it still doesn't work. They have said that I have all the files and portforwarding and everything done correctly and they don't know how to do it. If you can host, but you have no experience, that is completely okay! Just teamviewer with me or something and I'll be GLAD to do it all for you with the reward of co-owner! If you can help me with my hosting issue, you will be offered co-owner or admin (probably co-owner). Thanks for reading.
